content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to meet you. Let's start the negotiation. What is your proposed rental price for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am interested in the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I am smart, dependable, and responsible. I am not easily tricked by other people, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am willing to negotiate for the lowest price possible. What is the lowest price you would consider for this apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I appreciate your honesty about your status as a student. However, I am a business-minded individual and I want to get the best price for my property. I am not interested in being on good terms with my tenants, I am interested in the highest possible rent. I am willing to start the negotiation at €1,500 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your starting price is quite high for a student like me. I am looking for a more reasonable offer. Can you lower the price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I understand your need for a lower price, but I am not in the business of giving away my property for free. I am willing to lower the price to €1,400 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €1,400 is still quite steep for a student budget. I am hoping for something closer to €1,100 per month. Can we meet in the middle?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am willing to meet you halfway. I will accept €1,300 per month as the rental price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €1,300 is more reasonable. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I agree to the price of [1,300] Euro! TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
